thread.section_title: Intrepid Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Intrepid Travel | www.intrepidtravel.com
thread.title: Victoria

author: Victoria
title: Victoria
text: My sister and I went on the South Moroccan Discovery Tour (ten days). Our experience was absolutely wonderful, we loved every minute. The places we saw and the experiences we had were pure magic. The accomodation was excellent, we loved the food, the people on our tour were all really friendly and lovely to be around. Our drivers were always very careful and safe, and our tour guide Khalid made us feel very welcome, looking after everyone's needs at all times, and was a fantastic host from the first minute to the last. I totally recommend this trip, and would do it again in a heartbeat. Best. Holiday. Ever!
